sourcing.instructions: La2O3: Obtain from chemical suppliers or online marketplaces specializing in rare earth materials.
steps: La2O3: Obtain from chemical suppliers or online marketplaces specializing in rare earth materials.
1. Weigh out 40.8 g of La2O3, 103.2 g of Nd2O3, and 31.4 g of RuO2 using an analytical balance.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Weigh out 40.8 g of La2O3, 103.2 g of Nd2O3, and 31.4 g of RuO2 using an analytical balance.

steps: 1. After 6 hours, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down to room temperature naturally.
cooling.raw_text: 1. After 6 hours, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down to room temperature naturally.

steps: 1. Once cooled, remove the crucible and carefully extract the solid sample.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Once cooled, remove the crucible and carefully extract the solid sample.
